net.stemkoski.bagel

Class ActionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.ActionFactory

  • public class ActionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class for creating Action objects.

    • Method Detail

      • moveBy

        public static Action moveBy(double deltaX,
                            double deltaY,
                            double duration)
        Create an Action to move a Sprite by a fixed amount over a period of time.
        This Action is complete once movement has finished.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - distance to move Sprite in the x-direction
        deltaY - distance to move Sprite in the y-direction
        duration - total time to be used for movement
        Returns:
        Action to move a Sprite by a fixed amount over a period of time.

      • rotateBy

        public static Action rotateBy(double deltaAngle,
                              double duration)
        Create an Action to rotate a Sprite by a fixed amount over a period of time.
        This Action is complete once rotation has finished.
        Parameters:
        deltaAngle - angle to rotate Sprite
        duration - total time to be used for movement
        Returns:
        Action to rotate a Sprite by a fixed amount over a period of time

      • fadeOut

        public static Action fadeOut(double fadeRate)
        Create an Action to fade out (reduce opacity of) a Sprite over a period of time.
        To automatically remove a Sprite once it has finished fading out, use:
        ActionFactory.sequence( ActionFactory.fadeOut(fadeRate), ActionFactory,remove() )
        This Action is complete once the Sprite's opacity reaches 0.
        Parameters:
        fadeRate - amount to reduce opacity by per second
        Returns:
        Action to fade out a Sprite over a period of time

      • fadeIn

        public static Action fadeIn(double fadeRate)
        Create an Action to fade in (increase opacity of) a Sprite over a period of time.
        This Action is complete once the Sprite's opacity reaches 1.
        Parameters:
        fadeRate - amount to increase opacity by per second
        Returns:
        Action to fade in a Sprite over a period of time

      • sequence

        public static Action sequence(Action... actions)
        Create an Action to perform a sequence of actions. Each Action in the list is performed only after all previous actions in the list have completed.
        This Action is complete once all the corresponding actions are complete.
        Parameters:
        actions - one or more actions to perform in sequence
        Returns:
        Action to perform a sequence of actions

      • repeat

        public static Action repeat(Action action,
                            int totalTimes)
        Create an Action that repeats another Action a fixed number of times.
        This Action is complete once the specified Action has been completed the specified number of times.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to be repeated
        totalTimes - total number of times to repeat the specified Action
        Returns:
        Action that repeats another Action a fixed number of times

      • forever

        public static Action forever(Action action)
        Create an Action that repeats another Action forever.
        This Action is never complete.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to be repeated
        Returns:
        Action that repeats another Action forever

      • delay

        public static Action delay(double duration)
        Create an Action that waits for a specified amount of time. This is typically used in conjunction with sequence(Action...).
        This Action is complete once the specified amount of time passes.
        Parameters:
        duration - amount of time to wait
        Returns:
        Action that waits for a specified amount of time

      • remove

        public static Action remove()
        Create an Action that automatically removes a Sprite.
        This Action is complete immediately.
        Returns:
        Action that automatically removes a Sprite

      • boundToScreen

        public static Action boundToScreen(double screenWidth,
                                   double screenHeight)
        Create an Action that automatically calls Sprite.boundToScreen(double, double).
        This Action is never completed.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen
        Returns:
        Action that automatically calls Sprite.boundToScreen(double, double).

      • wrapToScreen

        public static Action wrapToScreen(double screenWidth,
                                  double screenHeight)
        Create an Action that automatically calls Sprite.wrapToScreen(double, double).
        This Action is never completed.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen
        Returns:
        Action that automatically calls Sprite.wrapToScreen(double, double).

      • destroyOutsideScreen

        public static Action destroyOutsideScreen(double screenWidth,
                                          double screenHeight)
        Create an Action that removes a Sprite if no portion of the Sprite remains within the screen boundaries.
        This Action is complete if the Sprite is removed from the screen.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen
        Returns:
        Action that removes an object if no portion of the object remains within the screen boundaries
